data.name: Alice is Dead: Hearts and Diamonds
data.detailed_description:
Alice is Dead is a grim, and twisted fantasy set in Wonderland. This classic noire series has you working to discover: who you are, who killed Alice, and (most of all) how to escape Wonderland. The puzzles of this game are unapologetically hard. And the game is littered with added details and secrets for those willing to dig deeper.

Alice is Dead

A complete HD remake, and retelling of the classic Alice is Dead Flash game trilogy, brought back to life by the series' original creators! This Hearts and Diamonds edition will be the definitive version of these stories, lacing together the larger lore and stories that were crafted over multiple years through it's original development.

Hearts and Diamonds

Alice is Dead somewhat infamously left the story on a major cliffhanger. Our goal with Alice is Dead: Hearts and Diamonds is to release an episodic series of mysterious point & click adventures, that expand the gameplay and lore of the original games - and explore this twisted version of Wonderland with a greater depth that millions of fans have been seeking for over a decade!

data.short_description: A complete remake of the classic Flash game trilogy, Alice is Dead. Hearts and Diamonds includes all new art, added puzzles, expanded lore, and plenty of secrets for old and new fans alike.
data.reviews:
“What the game has in spades (or hearts, if you're playing from a royal deck) is atmosphere. There are no scares or loud surprises, but Alice is Dead can send shivers up your spine from the first few screens.”
4.5/5 – JayIsGames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes cartoonish depictions of violence, as well indirect allusions to drug and alcohol abuse.
